cyclone.name: HENRI
cyclone.trajectory: moving west-southwest, then forecast to turn west-northwest and northwest keeping the center over the western Atlantic well east of the U.S. East Coast

weather_observation.watch_coast: Tropical Storm Watch in effect for Bermuda only
weather_observation.impacted_coast: Offshore waters from Bermuda northward toward the western Atlantic; low-level impact possible along Outer Banks to southern New England but storm center remains east of the coast
weather_observation.wind: Less than 3 % chance of sustained 34-kt winds; breezy conditions more likely than true gale at Wilmington, DE
weather_observation.storm_surge: None expected â€“ storm forecast track keeps center well offshore
weather_observation.rainfall: Little to no heavy rainfall expected at Wilmington, DE; only scattered light showers possible in peripheral moisture
weather_observation.other_hazards: Long-period swells and enhanced rip-current risk along Delaware and New Jersey beaches late in the week-end
